stories.title: File-level implementation tasks
stories.i_want: to see implementation tasks decomposed to specific file paths and functions in tasks.md
stories.so_that: I can execute each task precisely without self-decomposing from high-level descriptions

stories.title: Requirement traceability on tasks
stories.i_want: every task in tasks.md to show which requirement and acceptance criterion it fulfills
stories.so_that: I can verify complete coverage and trace any code change back to its justification

stories.title: Task dependency visibility
stories.i_want: tasks to declare explicit blocking relationships and a visible critical path
stories.so_that: I can identify parallel execution opportunities and understand the impact of task failures

stories.title: Automatic task refinement after design
stories.i_want: a refinement step that automatically converts design artifacts into file-level implementation tasks
stories.so_that: tasks.md becomes implementation-ready without manual decomposition by the developer agent

stories.title: Mechanical execution mode
stories.i_want: an option to have the developer agent follow tasks.md literally instead of self-decomposing
stories.so_that: I can ensure the implementation exactly matches the planned tasks with no drift

stories.title: Backward-compatible enhanced format
stories.i_want: the enhanced tasks.md format to preserve the existing checkbox pattern and not break my PLAN INTEGRATION PROTOCOL parsing
stories.so_that: I can continue working without changes while new agents leverage the enhanced data

stories.title: Updated plan integration protocol
stories.i_want: the PLAN INTEGRATION PROTOCOL to document how to handle the new annotations
stories.so_that: I know to preserve traceability and dependency data when updating tasks

stories.title: Enhanced plan validation
stories.i_want: to optionally validate that implementation tasks have file-level granularity
stories.so_that: agents are warned if the plan lacks detail before implementation begins
